statements: DELETE FROM pharmacy_products WHERE stored_location = 'Shelf A';
DELETE FROM pharmacy_products WHERE product_id = 1000 AND expiration_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM pharmacy_products WHERE stored_location = 'Warehouse A' AND product_name LIKE '%pain%'
DELETE FROM compliance_standards WHERE id IN (SELECT id FROM compliance_standards ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1);
DELETE FROM Inventory WHERE location = 'Warehouse A' AND quantity < 10;
DELETE FROM Product_Categories WHERE category_name = 'Medical Supplies';
DELETE FROM product_inventory WHERE product_id = 5 AND location_id = 3;
